'''Water Volume Detection Crystal''' is an exploration mechanic found in [[Fontaine]].

Continuously applying {{Hydro}} to the crystal will activate it. Having all Water Volume Detection Crystals activated at once will solve the puzzle. This can be accomplished by moving them into a body of [[water]] or using [[Hydrograna]].
